C

Card - Class in model
Contains functionality for a playing card.
Card(int) - Constructor for class model.Card
 
CardException - Exception in model
Exceptions related to misuse of Card Objects.
CardException(String) - Constructor for exception model.CardException
 
CardView - Class in view
Shows card image relative to given card value.
CardView() - Constructor for class view.CardView
 
clearSnap(int) - Method in class view.GameView
Clears nodes after a snap incident, removing shown card, removing snap notice, clearing turn notice and updating pile count view.
close() - Method in class view.GameView
Close the game stage.
controller - package controller
The controller package contains classes that interface between the user, the model and the view.
createEndScene(String) - Method in class view.GameView
Creates end scene indicating winner's name and adds it to gamePane.
createNewGame(Stage) - Method in class controller.GameViewController
Collects Player names and instantiates a new game, a game loop and a new game view.
createQuantityPicker(int, ArrayList<SnapCheckBox>) - Method in class view.StartSubScene
 
CreditsSubScene - Class in view
Sub scene showing game credits.
CreditsSubScene() - Constructor for class view.CreditsSubScene
Creates credit scene from credits text file found in resources.
